item.description:
November's book is The Cabal of the Westford Knight, a thriller written in the same vein as the Davinci Code. Written by David S. Brody, a resident of Westford MA, you'll go on a thrill ride through history and local sites (many of which you might recognize) to discover the secret of the Cabal.

We're meeting a little earlier in the month this time because of the Thanksgiving Holiday, but don't worry if you don't finish the book. Show up anyway!

We're also meeting in Nashua this time, which we haven't done yet. The place is called Fody's Great American Tavern.

Usual 12 person cap applies as always. However, I will make the RSVP Date a little later so that people can join if other folks cancel.

Hope to see you in Nov!!

P.S. We've also chosen our December book as well. It will be a classic.....with a twist. That's right! We're reading Pride and Prejudice....and Zombies!! Details for the Dec meeting will come out after we meet in Nov.

group.name: The Southern NH Books and Brew Club

item.name: Learn the secret of the Knight!
